Item.Name: Alton Towers Hotel
Item.Summary: This unique hotel is themed around the incredible explorer Sir Algenon, who has made the Alton Towers Hotel his home. There are plenty of fun and quirky features to discover, including his amazing flying ship which has crash-landed right in the middle of the hotel.

Item.Name: Alton Towers Spa
Item.Summary: Step inside and escape to a blissful oasis of luxurious tranquillity, nestled inside the beautiful grounds of the Alton Towers Resort.

Item.Name: Alton Towers Waterpark
Item.Summary: There's no end to the fun you can have in the Alton Towers Waterpark. You can unwind in Lagoona Bay or the Lazy River and let all your stresses float away, or enjoy some adrenaline thrilled adventure on the Master Blaster Water Coaster, sending you speeding round the Waterpark at exhilarating speeds.

Item.Name: Battle Galleons
Item.Summary:
Sail amidst shark infested waters to the pirate cove!

A marvellous spectacle for land lubbers and pirate crew, Battle Galleons is an interactive water ride which swashes the buckle for all ages.
Item.Keywords: battle galleons, pirates, splash, ships, water, water guns
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Bing's Picnic
Item.Summary:
Bing and Flop are having an exciting day out at Alton Towers Resort!  Join them as they stop off in Big Fun Showtime to have their picnic, play games and make some new friends.
An interactive show where children get to meet and play with Bing and Flop. Join in the fun and bring along your own picnic too!
Item.Keywords: bing, flop, show, cbeebies land, picnic

Item.Name: Buy The Smiler
Item.Summary: A collection of Smiler related merchandise.

Item.Name: CBeebies Land Hotel
Item.Summary: Step inside the rainbow and straight into the colourful world of the UK's only CBeebies Land Hotel, all uniquely designed for young families. A place bursting with music, stories and adventures for little ones to enjoy.

Item.Name: CBeebies Land Photo Studio
Item.Summary: Get your photo taken with your favourite CBeebies characters.
Item.Keywords: cbeebies, cbeebies land, photo, photo studio

Item.Name: Charlie and Lola's Moonsquirters & Greendrops
Item.Summary: Visit Charlie and Lola at their home on Crocodile Street, you might just see Soren Lorensen, and you might just have to help Lola make him some lunch. Have a peek in Charlie and Lola's bedroom, there's lots of dressing up to do.
Item.Keywords: cbeebies land, ball pit, interactive, dressing up

Item.Name: Coffee Lounge
Item.Summary: The perfect place to stop for a coffee between thrills. Proud to serve Costa Coffee.
Item.Keywords: costa coffee, hot drinks, breakfast, snacks, cakes, tea, hot chocolate

Item.Name: Coffee Shack
Item.Summary: The perfect place to stop for a coffee between thrills. Proud to serve Costa Coffee.
Item.Keywords: costa coffee, hot drinks, breakfast, snacks, cakes, tea, hot chocolate, ice cream

Item.Name: Congo River Rapids
Item.Summary: Let the rapids take you away! With rushing waters surging under you, sending you into a spin, as you navigate through waterfalls.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Corner Coffee
Item.Summary: Take a seat inside Corner Coffee, located on Towers Street, and treat yourself to a cappuccino, latte or something refreshing from the bar. There is also a large selection of sandwiches, baked pastries and delicious cakes for you to indulge into. Corner Coffee is the perfect place to refuel whilst taking a comforting break from our thrilling rides and attractions.
Item.Keywords: costa coffee, hot drinks, breakfast, snacks, cakes, tea, hot chocolate, breakfast

Item.Name: Cuckoo Cars Driving School
Item.Summary: Get behind the wheel of one of the crazy, colourful Cuckoo Cars - the hottest wheels in town! Show off your supercool style as you tootle around Cloud Cuckoo Land, meeting the lively locals who are awaiting your visit.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is greater than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Duel - The Haunted House Strikes Back
Item.Summary:
When the ghosts and ghouls attack, this is your chance to fight back. Load your laser guns and have your wits about you.

A legion of zombies have been drawn to the home of their creator, Dr Nicholas Roodyn, Prepare to Duel!
Item.Keywords: duel, haunted house, lazer gun, laser gun, shooting
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Eastern Express
Item.Summary: A selection of Asian cuisine.

Item.Name: Education Centre
Item.Summary: Discover a world where you can learn through fun on a school trip to Alton Towers Resort!

Item.Name: Enterprise
Item.Summary: A Ministry of Joy installation to totally disorientate you. Only the circular force of Enterprise keeps you in place, as the monstrous steel wheel drags you upwards until you are hanging upside down, and round and round.
Item.Keywords: spinning wheel, upside down, x sector
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Explorers Pizza Pasta Buffet
Item.Summary: Enter the Explorers restaurant and indulge in a buffet-style feast of mouth-watering Italian pizza and pasta dishes, accompanied by a lovely fresh side salad of your choice from our 'help yourself' salad bar. Located in Katanga Canyon, our delicious dishes are sure to fill any rumbling tummies, plus go up as many times as you like in this great value for money restaurant! Gluten free Pizza's available upon request.
Item.Keywords: all you can eat, italian, pizza, pasta, vegetarian, soft drinks

Item.Name: Extraordinary Golf
Item.Summary:
Test your skills at Extraordinary Golf located near Splash Landings Hotel, next to the car park and monorail station.

Two wacky 9-hole courses with outrageous obstacles themed around some of the most famous Alton Towers Resort rides and attractions. Putt your way to Oblivion and meet your Nemesis - a superb way to start or end your day.

Item.Name: Forest Feast
Item.Summary: A selection of snacks and foods, including hot dogs and jacket potatoes.
Item.Keywords: hot dogs, jacket potatoes, snack, chips, fries

Item.Name: Frog Hopper
Item.Summary: Take a giant leap, then up, down, up, down, up, down to the ground. Being a frog is foolishly fun.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Galactica
Item.Summary: Blast through an advanced launch portal to a dimension beyond your imagination. Soar,  spiral and glide in our iconic flying rollercoaster on an exhilarating expedition that frees you from the bounds of your earth forces.
Item.Keywords: air, flying, rollercoaster, roller coaster, coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Galactica Store
Item.Summary: A selection of Galactica themed merchandise.
Item.Keywords: air, shop, hoodies, t-shirts, VR, space, key rings, pens, mugs, virtual reality

Item.Name: Gallopers Carousel
Item.Summary: Hold tight everyone, here we go… Travel round and round on the Horses or Carriages on the Gallopers Carousel.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Get Set Go Tree Top Adventure
Item.Summary: The Get Set Go Tree Top Adventure is a great place for families to begin their day at CBeebies Land. Wake up the sleeping bugs in the CBeebies bedroom and Get Set Go on this fun ride offering plenty of imaginative play.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Go Jetters Vroomster Zoom Ride
Item.Summary: Join Kyan, Xuli, Lars and Foz on a Go Jetters global adventure as little thrill seekers fly around the world in a Vroomster.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.25 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Haunted Hollow
Item.Summary: Dare you walk through the Haunted Hollow down to the Gloomy Wood? Meet a few of our more ancient ancestors that still call it home.

Item.Name: Heave Ho
Item.Summary: Heave Ho and off we go! Rocking and twisting on top of the waves across Mutiny Bay.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Hex - The Legend of the Towers
Item.Summary: A beggar woman spurned by the arrogant Earl of Shrewsbury, as he returned home to Alton Towers one dark night, cast a curse that would last for centuries. How will the discovery of a sealed vault, hidden behind an old bookcase, give us any more insight to the tales?
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Hey Duggee Live: The Big Day Out Badge
Item.Summary: Duggee, Happy and their new Squirrel friend Jo need your help to plan the best day out ever for all the Squirrels.  If you can help them with the list of things they’d each like to do in CBeebies Land, you can earn a Big Day Out badge!
Item.Keywords: Hey Duggee, dugee, big day out badge, show, cbeebies land

Item.Name: In The Night Garden Magical Boat Ride
Item.Summary: Set sail on the magical In The Night Garden Boat Ride where you’ll be able to journey through a real Night Garden and spot all your favourite characters – whether it’s Upsy Daisy waving and blowing kisses or the Tombliboos playing peek-a-boo, everyone is there to find... even Igglepiggle!
Item.Keywords: upsy daisy, iggle piggle, cbeebies land
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Just Chicken
Item.Summary: Enjoy our luscious Chicken coated in our very own unique seasoning recipe plus take on our ultimate donut burger.
Item.Keywords: kfc, fried chicken, chicken burgers, fries, soft drinks

Item.Name: Justin's House Pie-O-Matic Factory
Item.Summary: Just like Justin’s House, the Pie-O-Matic Factory is full of fun chaos! Yes, Robert has been inventing again – this time it’s a factory for making the best custard pies and your job is to get the cherries on top!
Item.Keywords: mr tumble, cbeebies land, play area
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your age is less than 16 years, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Katanga Cargo
Item.Summary: Venture inside this amazing emporium and marvel at the huge selection of products and gifts on offer. Whether you’re buying something for yourself or a gift for someone else, you’re bound to find something you’ll love inside this jungle-themed store.
Item.Keywords: shop, rapids, mine train, runaway train, toys, plush, teddy, bears, t-shirts, mugs, medals

Item.Name: Little Explorers Lunch Box
Item.Summary: Serving freshly prepared hot and cold sandwiches, hearty pies and pick and mix picnics. Free Heinz baby food with an adult meal, plus children’s activity sheets available. High chairs are available in all the above restaurants. Please ask a member of our team if you require baby food/bottle warming facilities.

Item.Name: Little Explorers Toy Box
Item.Summary: You can find a wide range of souvenirs featuring your favourite CBeebies friends, the CBeebies bugs and exclusive CBeebies Land items!
Item.Keywords: cbeebies, characters, in the night garden, postman pat, octonauts, toys, games, bing

Item.Name: Enchanted Village Luxury Treehouses
Item.Summary: Nestled in the beautiful surroundings of the Enchanted Village, experience our luxury Treehouses for that extra special escape.

Item.Name: Marauder's Mayhem
Item.Summary: Swirl and twirl with the gunpowder barrels which make up Marauder's Mayhem. Beware the actions of your crewmates, who can make the barrel spin faster.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Medical Centre
Item.Summary: An on-site Medical Centre.

Item.Name: Monorail - Entrance Plaza
Item.Summary: Hop on-board the Monorail back to the Hotels & Car Parks

Item.Name: Monorail - Hotels & Car Parks
Item.Summary: Begin your escape to the Theme Park by climbing aboard the Monorail for a short journey to the Theme Park entrance.

Item.Name: Mr. Bloom's Allotment
Item.Summary: For hands-on fun, venture down the garden path to Mr. Bloom’s Allotment. Mr. Bloom is on holiday, he has left his neighbour Mr. Blossom in charge who needs the help of willing Tiddlers!

Item.Name: Mutiny Bay Donuts
Item.Summary: Fresh donuts to take away.

Item.Name: Mutiny Bay Hot Dogs, Waffles & Wraps
Item.Summary: Serving a range of tasty quick bites to eat including Wraps, Hot Dogs & Waffles from Wafflemeister.

Item.Name: Nemesis
Item.Summary: Ride the twists and turns of Nemesis, as it races past the rocks and rivers of Forbidden Valley. Inverted on the track, it corkscrews, spins and races over the twisted steel track, making it one of the most heart-pounding, exciting and exhilarating rides!
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Nemices Donuts
Item.Summary: Fresh donuts to take away.

Item.Name: Nitrogenie
Item.Summary: Ice cream from magic.
Item.Keywords: liquid nitrogen, nitrogen, ice cream, milkshakes

Item.Name: Oblivion
Item.Summary: Oblivion beckons you to face your fears, and as you’re held, overhanging the edge of the world’s first vertical drop rollercoaster, you get a moment to savour what is to come. Prepare yourself - the drop into Oblivion is imminent.
Item.Keywords: vertical drop, rollercoaster, roller coaster, coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Octonauts Rollercoaster Adventure
Item.Summary: Dive into CBeebies Land and join Captain Barnacles and crew as The Octonauts head to Alton Towers Resort on a Octonauts Rollercoaster Adventure!
Item.Keywords: octonaughts, captain barnacles, barnacles, cbeebies land, coaster, rollercoaster, roller coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Peter Rabbit Hippity Hop
Item.Summary: Playful Benjamin Bunny has hidden from his friends in Mr McGregor’s garden – join Peter Rabbit and Lily Bobtail as they explore the garden and solve puzzles to try to uncover his hiding place!  Unleash your inner bunny on the Peter RabbitTM Hippity Hop ride and hop high into the sky to see if you can find Benjamin from the top!
Item.Keywords: peter rabbit, bunny rabbit, cbeebies land
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Postman Pat Parcel Post
Item.Summary: Postman Pat’s parcels have been mixed up! Report to the Sorting Office to receive your instructions and become part of Postman Pat’s Special Delivery Service.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Rehydration Station (Forbidden Valley)
Item.Summary: Offering a variety of snacks and drinks.
Item.Keywords: popcorn, ice cream, crisps, snacks, soft drinks, quencher, refill, coca cola

Item.Name: Rehydration Station (The Towers)
Item.Summary: Offering a variety of snacks and drinks.
Item.Keywords: popcorn, ice cream, crisps, snacks, soft drinks, quencher, refill, coca cola

Item.Name: Rehydration Station (X Sector)
Item.Summary: Offering a variety of snacks and drinks.
Item.Keywords: popcorn, ice cream, crisps, snacks, soft drinks, quencher, refill, coca cola

Item.Name: Resort Box Office
Item.Summary: Providing guest information and ticket sales.
Item.Keywords: guest services, complaints, fastrack, access, ride access pass, disabled, wheelchair

Item.Name: Rita
Item.Summary: Brace yourself – as the lights turn green, Rita powers you straight to 100kph in just 2.5 seconds, putting your body through 4.5G. At lightning pace, Rita navigates every twist and turn of the track, as you break free from the clutches of the Dark Forest.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Rollercoaster Restaurant
Item.Summary:
Located at Alton Towers Resort the Rollercoaster Restaurant is set below a vast rollercoaster track, where you can watch as orders tackle two gravity defying loop-the-loops before dropping 8 metres - the equivalent of two double decker buses - down the tornado spiral to the table.

Lunch time booking is not essential, visit the restaurant on the day for the next available table. Booking for dinner time is essential. During Scarefest & Fireworks Theme Park Admission is required at all times.
Item.Keywords: coaster, steak, grills, vegetarian, burgers, curry, salad, pasta, ribs

Item.Name: Runaway Mine Train
Item.Summary: The Runaway Mine Train twists and turns, getting faster and faster.
Item.Keywords: runaway train, coaster, rollercoaster, roller coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult. If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Sharkbait Reef by SEA LIFE
Item.Summary: Under the wreckage of the galleon in Mutiny Bay, Captain Black and his crew open up Sharkbait Reef. Brimming with blacktip sharks and chocolate chip starfish, spotted rays, seahorses and the UK’s first Tropical Interactive Pool with shrimp that will manicure the tips of your fingers if you dip them into the touch pool.

Item.Name: Sharkbait Reef Shoppe
Item.Summary: Take home some Pirate treasure or a memory from your underwater adventure in Sharkbait Reef!
Item.Keywords: sea life shop, toys, plush bears, fish toys, sweets, drinks, under the sea, t-shirts, clothes

Item.Name: Something Special Sensory Garden
Item.Summary: There’s something special about the Something Special Sensory Garden. Follow Mr Tumble’s spotty bag trail and look out for some special objects as you wind your way through the woodland and garden.

Item.Name: Spinball Whizzer
Item.Summary: Feel like a pin ball being catapulted along the 470 metre track at speeds of up to 60km per hour!  Each car will spin 360 degrees whilst flying around the tracks.
Item.Keywords: pinball, sonic, coaster, rollercoaster, roller coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Splash Landings Hotel
Item.Summary: For a touch of Caribbean fun all year round, book a break to the fully-themed Splash Landings Hotel — If you need some extra space, the larger Beachcomber rooms can accommodate a family of six.

Item.Name: Spooks R Us
Item.Summary: Enter the Spooks R Us store and be amazed by all the ghostly tricks & treats. Pick out a ghoulish gift for your friends or family or simply choose a spooky gift for yourself.
Item.Keywords: duel shop, posters, glow in the dark, t-shirts, hats

Item.Name: Stargazing Pods
Item.Summary:
New for 2019! Escape to the great British Outdoors and stay in the brand new Stargazing Pods at Alton Towers Resort.

Set around a village green the minimalistic themed pods are perfect for families, couples and friends. In the evening as the night sky emerges seek out one of the telescopes to see the stars above. Will you discover some of the Resort's own constellations?

Item.Name: Teletubbies Big Band Live Show
Item.Summary: Tinky-Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po will transport you over the hills and far away to the iconic Teletubbyland, where you’ll get to play-along as you enjoy a delightfully interactive music and dance-filled performance.  You can also ‘meet and greet’ the Teletubbies each day following the twice-daily performances in Big Fun Showtime, before waving Tubby Bye Bye!
Item.Keywords: tinky winky, dipsy, la la, po, telletubbies, teletubies

Item.Name: TH13TEEN
Item.Summary:
If you go down to the woods today you'd better not go alone... Dip and dive through the Dark Forest, enter the ancient crypt and face the horror that lies within.

The dark and mysterious TH13TEEN is the world’s first freefall drop rollercoaster.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is greater than 1.96 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: The Alton Towers Dungeon
Item.Summary: The Alton Towers Dungeon, a hilariously hideous journey through Staffordshire’s darkest history. Uncover secrets from the past, hidden deep beneath the Towers.  Buy your tickets at www.altontowers.com/traitor
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your age is less than 10 years, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: The Blade
Item.Summary: In a few swings of The Blade, you'll be zero gravity, near vertical.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult. If your height is less than 1 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: The Burger Kitchen (Mutiny Bay)
Item.Summary: The Burger Kitchen offers succulent burgers combining premium ingredients to create the best burgers possible! With a menu that provides great variety, The Burger Kitchen restaurants are perfect for all visitors, whether it's for a great dining experience or a 'grab and go' the choice is yours.
Item.Keywords: burger king, mcdonalds, mc donalds, chicken nuggets

Item.Name: The Burger Kitchen (Cloud Cuckoo Land)
Item.Summary: The Burger Kitchen offers succulent burgers combining premium ingredients to create the best burgers possible! With a menu that provides great variety, The Burger Kitchen restaurants are perfect for all visitors, whether it's for a great dining experience or a 'grab and go' the choice is yours.

Item.Name: The Furchester Hotel Live Show
Item.Summary:
A brand new live and interactive show, where you can join Phoebe, Funella, Furgus, Elmo and Cookie Monster at The Furchester Hotel.
Make your way through the famous revolving doors before being welcomed with furry arms into the hotel.

The show sees the hotel prepare for the exciting arrival of Chick Swagger, you can sing and dance along to the rock-a-doodle-do hit, Tail Feather Shake.

Item.Name: The Gardens
Item.Summary: Take a break from the twists and turns of the Alton Towers Theme Park's rollercoasters and enjoy a stroll through the elegant gardens.

Item.Name: The Numtums Number-Go-Round
Item.Summary: Time to get counting with the Numtums on their Number-Go-Round – hop aboard your own Numtum cart and take control at the steering wheel as you whizz around.
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: The Smiler
Item.Summary: The Smiler is the world’s first 14-loop rollercoaster. Its twisting track combines the world beating 14 loops with a speed of 85 km/h and a track length 3x longer than Oblivion!
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: The Towers
Item.Summary: Founded on the site of an Iron Age camp, there were actually many different buildings before the existing Towers, but from 1412 until 1924 they all belonged to the same family - the Talbots (Earls of Shrewsbury).

Item.Name: The Welcom-Inn
Item.Summary: Offering a wide variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks.
Item.Keywords: bar, wine, beer, spirits, tea, coffee

Item.Name: Ticket Sales & Collection
Item.Summary: Your first stop on your escape to Alton Towers Resort. Have an E-Ticket? Head straight to the turnstiles

Item.Name: Toilets (Big Fun Showtime)
Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Name: Toilets (Entrance Plaza)
Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Name: Toilets (Forbidden Valley)
Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities and accessible changing place.
Item.Keywords: baby change, changing place, disabled, additional needs

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities.

Item.Summary: Toilets with baby changing facilities and accessible changing place
Item.Keywords: baby change, changing place, disabled, additional needs

Item.Name: Tormented Treats
Item.Summary: Offering various snacks and treats.
Item.Keywords: popcorn, ice cream, crisps, snacks, soft drinks, quencher, refill, coca cola

Item.Name: Towers Hot Dogs and Donuts
Item.Summary: Fresh hot dogs and donuts to take away.

Item.Name: Towers Trading Company
Item.Summary: This is the ideal place to pick up that perfect souvenir to commemorate your visit to Alton Towers Resort or a gift for a friend or family member. It has a huge variety of keepsakes for you to purchase, ensuring your trip to Alton Towers Resort is unforgettable!
Item.Keywords: main shop, big shop, entrance shop, store, hoodies, t-shirts, hats, stationary, ride merchandise,

Item.Name: Tree Fu Tom Training Camp
Item.Summary: At the Tree Fu Tom Training Camp, join Tom and friends on an amazing new adventure where play can help transform you into a Tree Fu master.

Item.Name: Wicker Man
Item.Summary:
Join the chosen ones on the world’s most immersive rollercoaster experience to date, unifying cutting edge special effects with classic wooden coaster technology for the first time!

Be Chosen.
Item.Keywords: wickerman, wooden, coaster, rollercoaster, roller coaster
Item.ShareMessage: Be Chosen on Wicker Man at Alton Towers Resort #wickermanride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Wicker Man Shop
Item.Summary: You have been chosen, ride the ride and now visit the shop, for exclusive souvenirs,  from mugs and clothing through to specially created bespoke items for the ride.
Item.Keywords: wickerman shop, mugs, clothing, wicker, bags, hats, runes, ride wood, t-shirts, hoodies

Item.Name: Woodcutters Bar & Grill
Item.Summary: Freshly prepared meals, delivered straight to your table, from mouth-watering steaks to succulent grilled chicken breast for you to sink your teeth into! Vegetarian, gluten free and children’s meals are also available, plus you will receive a FREE fruit bag with every child’s meal that you purchase.

Item.Name: Enchanted Village Woodland Lodges
Item.Summary: Enjoy an enchanting break in one of our Woodland Lodges, located in the beautiful Enchanted Village, where the never seen and never heard fable folk are here to ensure you have a fantastic escape.

Feature.Title: Stargazing Pods
Feature.Summary: Escape to the great British Outdoors and stay in the brand new Stargazing Pods

Feature.Title: 2019 Season Pass
Feature.Summary: Your key to days and days of Theme Park fun from only £56

Feature.Title: The Alton Towers Dungeon
Feature.Summary: A hilariously hideous journey through Staffordshire’s darkest history. Uncover secrets hidden deep beneath the Towers

Offer.Title: Midweek Short Breaks from £139
Offer.Summary: Enjoy a midweek escape, ride the UK's top rollercoasters, explore CBeebies Land and enjoy a fun-filled evening with B&B
Offer.Description:
Your short break includes:
1 day Theme Park including new CBeebies Land friends and 6 of the UK's top rollercoasters.
Enjoy an overnight stay in a Themed Hotel or Woodland Lodge.
1 hour early access to the Theme Park.
Fantastical evening entertainment.
A scrumptious breakfast awaits.
 
Select your dates between 26th March and 19th October 2017. Valid Sunday - Thursdays. Excluding school holidays.

Offer.Title: Save over £20 per person on Theme Park tickets
Offer.Summary: When you book online 5+ days in advance.
Offer.Description:
5+ Days in Advance - £32 adult, £27.50 child
1-4 Days in Advance - £40 adult, £35 child
On the day - £52.80 adult, £46.80 child
Enter the Theme Park and enjoy selected rides one hour before opening when you book online!
Under 3's go free! You can collect Under 3 tickets at the main entrance of the Theme Park.

Offer.Title: Spa - Summer Sizzler
Offer.Summary: Only £60 per person - three hours in our Aqua Relaxation Rooms, enjoy a mini bottle of prosecco and two heavenly treatments
Offer.Description:
Unwind this summer with three hours in our Aqua Relaxation Rooms, enjoy a sparkling mini bottle of prosecco and two heavenly treatments.

**To book, visit the Alton Towers Spa, Resort Box Office or call 0871 702 7043* (Calls cost 13p per minute plus network extras)**

Offer.Title: Free video game voucher
Offer.Summary: Enjoy one free video game either in Mutiny Bay or The Edge arcades
Offer.Description: Redeem your code and then show your app to the attendant in either at Mutiny Bay Arcade or The Edge Arcade in Forbidden Valley to enjoy one go on a video game of your choice.

Offer.Title: After 4pm - 20% off Pizza Pasta
Offer.Summary: Enjoy 20% off Explorer's Pizza Pasta after 4pm when you show the Alton Towers Resort app
Offer.Description: Enjoy 20% off Explorer's Pizza Pasta after 4pm when you show the Alton Towers Resort app to your server when you first enter the restaurant. This offer is valid until 03/09/2017

Offer.Title: Fireworks - Prebook
Offer.Summary: This year's event is selling fast, book now to guarantee entry.
Offer.Description:
Join us for a spectacular Fireworks event, that will dazzle and delight!
 
On 4th & 5th November, this sensational display will be your last chance to experience our world beating rides and attractions before our 2017 season comes to an end.

Book online to save money and guarantee entry!

Offer.Title: Have you finished your Christmas shopping?
Offer.Summary: The Alton Towers Spa is the perfect place to pick up those last minute Christmas gifts...
Offer.Description:
We have a fantastic range of DECLEOR products starting from just £12. 

Head down to the Alton Towers Spa Reception on the ground floor of the Alton towers Hotel to view the wide range of fabulous gifts we have on offer.

Offer.Title: Terrifying Scare Mazes
Offer.Summary: Purchase your Scare Mazes tickets using your phone
Offer.Description:
**Scarefest takes place on selected dates: 6th - 7th, 13th - 14th, 19th October - 2nd November**

This year our multi-award winning scare mazes have been re-scarified and we've added another NEW maze to the line-up! Spine-tingling frights await those brave enough to enter...

**Purchase your Scare Maze tickets using your phone - select 'E-Ticket' at the checkout**

Offer.Title: House of Monsters
Offer.Summary: 25 minutes of laughs, frights, theatre and special effects
Offer.Description:
**Scarefest takes place on selected dates: 6th - 7th, 13th - 14th, 19th October - 2nd November**

25 minutes of laughs, frights, theatre and special effects, set in a maze of 7 live shows. Plus a brand new show for 2018!

**Purchase your Scare Maze tickets using your phone - select 'E-Ticket' at the checkout**

Offer.Title: Save 10% at Rollercoaster Restaurant
Offer.Summary: Dine between 3pm and 4pm and enjoy 10% off your bill at Rollercoaster Restaurant
Offer.Description:
Take your seat at Rollercoaster Restaurant between 3pm and 4pm and you can enjoy 10% off your bill when you show the Alton Towers Resort app!

Located near Galactica the Rollercoaster Restaurant is set below a vast rollercoaster track, where you can watch as orders tackle two gravity defying loop-the-loops before dropping 8 metres - the equivalent of two double decker buses - down the tornado spiral to the table.

Offer.Title: February Half Term
Offer.Summary: Ahoy! Join us for the most swashbucklin’ overnight stay of them all!
Offer.Description: Ahoy! Join us at the Alton Towers Resort this February for the most swashbucklin’ takeover of them all! Our Pirate and Princess Takeover returns for 2019 with tons of Pirate and Princess activities for all the family.

Offer.Title: The Alton Towers Dungeon
Offer.Summary: Laugh & Scream through Staffordshire's darkest history for only £7.50
Offer.Description:
The Alton Towers Dungeons is an interactive journey through Staffordshire’s darkest history, guaranteed to make you laugh and scream in equal measure.

This 45 minute experience journeys through 5 hands on shows, a boat ride* and 6 themed areas. From the frantically funny to the seriously spooky, each show will introduce you to a real historical person from a key moment in Staffordshire’s history.

Recommended for ages 10+, reserve your time in the Alton Towers Dungeon which is located next to the Dark Forest behind the Tower Ruins.

Buy your ticket at www.altontowers.com/traitor

Offer.Title: 2019 Season Pass
Offer.Summary: Upgrade today from only £23 and come back all season for free!*
Offer.Description: Visit the Resort Box Office to upgrade your ticket into days and days of Theme Park fun! Standard Season Passes are available from £23 (Exclusions apply) or you can upgrade to a Premium Season Pass from £37 and visit during Scarefest & unlock the key to the Alton Towers Dungeon

Offer.Title: Merlin Annual Pass Sale
Offer.Summary: Don't miss out... Easter sale now on!
Offer.Description:
Visit the Resort Box Office today to upgrade your ticket to a Merlin Annual Pass to enjoy an incredible year with your family. Over 30 of the UK’s top attractions are waiting to be explored…

Merlin Annual Passholders receive the following benefits:

- 12 months entry into over 30 top UK attractions 
- Save 20% on food, drinks & retail
- Discounts on overnight stays
- Discounted entry for family & friends

Offer.Title: 2019 Season Pass
Offer.Summary: Upgrade today from only £23 and come back all season for free!*
Offer.Description: Visit the Resort Box Office to upgrade your ticket into days and days of Theme Park fun! Standard Season Passes are available from £23 (Exclusions apply) or you can upgrade to a Premium Season Pass from £37 and visit during Scarefest & unlock the key to the Alton Towers Dungeon

For more information about how we manage your personal data, please read our Privacy Policy. To change your preferences or to stop receiving direct marketing emails from us, you just need to click the link at the bottom of our emails.
